verses.content: LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung nâwk a;
“Nang mihriem naupa, Tura ta dingin sûnna hla siem la,
Tura kuoma chun, Aw nang tuisuoriet lûtnaa chênga, thlierkâr tamtakhai kuoma hnamhai dâwr- kaitu, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Nang aw Tura, ‘Mâwinaa chun ka famkim an nâwm,’ i tih a.
I ramrihai chu tuisuoriethai rila chun a um a, Nanga lo bâwltuhai che chun i mâwina an lo sukfamkim ngei el che,
I thingphêkhai chu an siem, Senir fâr thing vawngin, I lawngngulhai dingin Lebanon sidar thinghai an lâk a.
I lawngzâpna an siem Basan thingsaisuohaiin, I ṭuong chu Kittima thing tlo chi saihaa tuomkhumin.
Nangma inchikna bîk a nina dingin I puonzâr chu Aigupta mi puon zai inhmi ṭiel a nih. I inchung chu Elisa thlierkâra inthawka dumpâwl le sendukin.
Zidon le Arvada chênghai chu i lawngkartu an na, I mi varhai chu, aw Tura, i sûnga chun an um a,
I Lawngpuhai an nih. Gebala upahai le mi varhai chu, I sûnga chun i lawng siemtu an na, Tuisuoriet lawng lienhai po po le an lawngpuhai chu I sûngah an um, i sumdâwngna thilhai thleng vêl dingin.
“Persia le Lud le Put mihai chu, i sipai pâwl indo mihai chu an nih; anni chun nangmaa chun thîrlukhum le phaw chu an khai a, i ngainobeina chu an târlang a nih.
Arvad mihai chu i sipai pâwlhai le chun a vêlin i kula chun an um a; Gammadim mihai chu i in insânghaia chun an um bawk a. I kul vêl po poa chun phawhai an khai a, i mawina an sukfamkim bawk a.
Hausakna tinrêng tam leiin Tarsis chu i sumdâwngtu a na; tang- karuo le, thîr le rângva le, suonin i chan dingin an sumdâwng a.
Javan, Tubal le Mesek chu i sumdâwngtu an na, mihriemahai le, dârsen bûr le bêlhaiin i sum dingin an sumdâwng a.
Togarma sûngkuohai chu i chan dingin sakawrhai, indona sakawrhai le sabengtung lien chi haiin an sumdâwng a.
Dedan mihai chu i sumdâwng- tuhai an ni bawk a; thlierkâr tamtakhai chu i kuta sumdâwngna thilhai chu an na; thalhrit le saiha kihai chu an hung thlengpêk cheh a.
I kutsuok thil tam leiin Suria chu i sumdâwngtu a na, lunghluhai, puon dum pâwl hai, ṭhuimawi hai, puon zai inhmi hai, lungmantam- hai le, tuihuom lunghaiin an sum- dâwng a.
Juda le Israel ram chu i sum- dâwngtuhai an na, i thuomhnaw dingin, Minnith bu le, pannag leh, khuoizu le hriek le, thinghnai dam- dawiin an sumdâwng a.
I kut sinthaw tam lei le, hau- sakna chi tinrêng tam leiin, Damaska khawm chu i sumdâwngtu a na; sahmul var chi le Helbon uoin chun a sumdâwng a.
Vedan le Javan khawm chu i thuomhnaw dingin Uzal uoinin an sumdâwng a, i sumdâwngna thuom- hnaw lai chun thîr tle mi dâm, thingzungthak dâm, mafu dâm an ṭhang a.
Dedan chu chuongpha puon hlutak takhaia i sumdâwngtu a nih.
Arabia le Kedar lalhai po po chu i kuta sumdâwngtuhai an na; berâm- tehai, berâmhai, kêlhaiin, hienghaia hin i sumdâwngtuhai an nih.
Seba le Raama sumdâwngtuhai chu i sumdâwngtuhai an na; i thuom- hnaw dingin rângkachak dâm, lung hluhai po po dâmin, riminhnik bîk taktakhai dâmin an sumdâwng a.
Haran le, Kanne le Eden, Seba sumdâwngtuhai chu, Assur le Kilmad leh i sumdâwngtuhai an nih.
Hienghai hi thuomhnaw dittui- hai a dumpâwl fûn le, cheimawihai le, sidara siem, hruihaia khuop sil- fên hlu bâwmhai le, i sumdâwngna thilhai laia sumdâwngtuhai chu an na.
Tarsis lawnglienhai chu i dâwr thuomhnaw phurtuhai an nih: Nang chu hluosip nâwka umin tuisuoriethai lairila chun ropuitaka siemin i um a,
I lawngkartuhai chun tui nasataka chun an hung ṭhuoi cheh a, Sak thli chun tuisuoriethai lairila chun a suksiet cheh a.

I hausaknahai, i thuomhnaw- hai, i dâwrsumhai, i lawng- puhai, I ṭhuoituhai, i lawng remtuhai, i dâwrsum thleng vêltuhai, I indo mihai i sûnga um po pohai, I sûnga i pâwlhai um po pohai le chun, I sietna nia chun Tuisuoriet lairila chun tlâng in tih.
I lawngpuhai khêk ri chun a vêl mihai inthin an tih.
Lawngkarna cheltuhai po po le lawngpuhai le Tuisuorieta lawng puhai po po chu, An lawnghaia inthawk hung thlâng an ta, hnuoiah hung ngîr an ta;
An râwlhai chu i chunga hriet dingin siem an ta, Lungna takin ṭap an tih. Chun, an lu chunga chun pilvutin inthêkhum an ta, Vuta chun anni chu inbuol an tih.
I ta dingin invâwkawl an ta, saiip puonin inthuom an ta, Rinumtitaka sûna, lungrila natitakin ṭâng an ti che!
An ṭapinrûm chun ṭap hla insamin Nangma chu sûn an ti cheh a, ‘Tura anga tuisuorieta to ṭawka um dinga siem hi tu am an um a?
I thuomhnawhai chu tuisuorieta inthawka a fe suok lai chun Hnam tamtakhai chu i suksip a; I dâwrsum le i hausaknahai chun hnuoia lalhai chu i sukhausa tah a,
Tui inthûkhaia tuisuoriethaiin a suksiet lai che khan, I dâwrsumhai, i pâwlhai po po i sûnga mi chu nangma leh an tlum tah a.
Thlierkâr hluotuhai po po chu nangmaa chun mak an tih a, An lalhai chu nasatakin an ṭih a, an hmêl khawm a buoi zo a.
Hnamhai laia dâwrkaihai chun an sisi khum che a, Nangma chu ṭium i lo ni tah a, iengtika khawm um nâwk ta naw ti nih,’” tiin.
